Name: ASSERT( Image$$EXTSRAM_DSP_TX$$Base >= Image$$SHARED_EXTSRAM_MCURW_HWRW_ZI$$ZI$$Limit, "SYSGEN ERROR: [1.2][Memory Expired] SHARED_EXTSRAM_MCURW_HWRW_ZI region overlaps EXTSRAM_DSP_TX region")
ASSERT( Image$$SWLA_REGION$$Length >= 0x18000, "SYSGEN ERROR: [1.3][Memory Expired]SWLA_REGION Size must be atleast 96KB!")
ASSERT( ROM_TEXT$$Limit <= 0x1000000, "SYSGEN ERROR: [1.4][Memory Expired] L1CORE ROM text end must smaller than 16MB!")
